docs.text: as the small boats rock slowly toward the shore at omaha beach normandy on d-day , the weary , seasick soldiers take a deep breath and open the large protective shield at the back of the boat .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they are unaware of exactly what is going to happen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one man kisses the crucifix that hangs around his neck .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the flap falls , the battle begins .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they are trapped like rats in a cage and proceed to be blown to pieces in the wake of enemy gunfire .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: amid the chaos of this massacre , stands a shot that , at least for me , hangs in the air like the girl in the little red coat in schindler's list .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a soldier , clearly missing an arm , wanders around the body-strewn beach like a lost puppy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we are not invited to know what he is searching for until he finds it himself .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he bends over , picks up his arm and starts to carry it , probably not bothering to ask himself ; " what now ? "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: saving private ryan is a masterfully composed film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the direction is out of this world , surely the type of command that can win spielberg another directing oscar .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the cinematography , by janusz kaminsky , is also astounding .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but be forewarned , this is the most violent and graphic film i have ever seen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the articles you read and the warnings you see are justified ; saving private ryan is visually as disturbing as a film can get .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the question is , " does the story and its realism justify the excessive use ? "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the answer from my point of view is " no " .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: braveheart was a truly gritty , and , one would imagine , realistic battle film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ryan is ten times worse .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: expect disembowelments , sucked in skulls , heads blown to bits , arms and legs flying across the battlefield .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: many in the theater could not bear to watch .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and it is a shame , too , because this is otherwise by far one of the standouts this year .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but such graphic displays may turn away even the most loyal spielberg supporters ( and academy members ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: saving private ryan takes us from the attack at omaha beach on d-day , 1944 , through into the film's primary mission .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: captain miller ( hanks ) assembles an 8 man crew and sets off to find a missing solider , private ryan , whose three brothers have already been killed on the battlefield .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the government goes to great lengths to make sure that mrs . ryan doesn't recieve a fourth letter of condolences about her sons , that no person should suffer such injustice .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: miller's crew is not in favor of the mission and they begin to harbor a secret hatred for ryan , though they don't yet know him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they resent having to trudge out to bring home one soldier who doesn't have any more or less right to live than any of them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this film manages to keep up a rapid pace and , though there is a lot of set up between battles , the story continues full speed to the end .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the pacing and dramatism of the extremely well choreographed battle scenes is really in a league of it's own .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: spielberg , though not a student of the " quick cut " school of filmmaking , takes a stab at it here , and does it better than michael bay or any of his mtv counterparts could ever hope to do it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: bay should pay close attention , take copious notes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if you want to jump cut every two seconds , do it the way spielberg does it in ryan .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the end , the extremity of the gory violence is not justified by the " importance " of the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: schindler's list taught many people the truth about the holocaust .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it opened eyes , sparked debate and study .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: though the battle scenes in ryan have never been portrayed as realistically before , they don't amount to anything as serious or thought provoking as the schindler's list .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: overall , this is just the truest depiction of the old adage , " war is hell . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but braveheart-dosage would have fit this movie much more appropriately , and would have made the difference between me getting up the nerve to see it again some day and realizing that this is something i doubt i could endure again .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: masterful work marred only by excessive gore .
docs.label: positive
